title: 为什么FTB1.7.10整合包无法登陆
author: lzsbhehe
txt_content:
就是啊 我下载完毕点击登陆 就等一会显示错误信息 没法进 只限于1.7.10的
错误信息如下Logging in... Beginning authlib authentication attempt successfully created YggdrasilAuthenticationService Login complete. Checking local assets file, for MC version1.7.10 Please wait!  library JSON download failed: java.net.ConnectException: Connection timed out: connect Setting up native libraries for FTB Infinity 1.7 v Recommended Version MC 1.7.10 Syncing Assets: Java Path: C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.8.0_40\bin\javaw.exe Pack: FTB Infinity 1.7 1.7.10 Setting MinMemory to 256 Setting MaxMemory to 4864 Adding Optimization Arguments: -XX:+UseParNewGC -XX:+UseConcMarkSweepGC -XX:+CICompilerCountPerCPU -XX:+TieredCompilation [17:43:51] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Loading tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker [17:43:51] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Using primary tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker [17:43:51] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Calling tweak class cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/google/common/collect/Lists         at cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker.acceptOptions(FMLTweaker.java:50)         at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.launch(Launch.java:114)         at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.main(Launch.java:28) Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: com.google.common.collect.Lists         at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)         at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)         at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)         at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)         ... 3 more

replies.txt_content: 多试几次就好了，我下载地图也这样

replies.author: huanghongxun
replies.txt_content:
网络不好，库没有下载完成
请重新下载

replies.author: lzsbhehe
replies.txt_content:
huanghongxun 发表于 2015-6-27 18:22
网络不好，库没有下载完成
请重新下载
我用的VPN 在FTB启动器上下载的
你确定是正版吗FTB好像要正版
